"The data on this page were constructed as part of the paper ""Building a composite Help-Wanted Index"" (Barnichon, 2010)."	
"Anyone is free to download the data and use it in his/her own research, as long as he/she cites the aforementioned paper."	
	
See the paper for details and construction methods.
